Word of the Day: Connascence

Posted by code_monkey_steve, 2009-05-05 00:00:00 -0700

Connascence


Con-nas-cence
n. 1. The common birth of two or more at the same time; production of two or more together.
2. That which is born or produced with another.
3. The act of growing together.

From Jim Weirich’s intriguing acts_as_conference presentation on The Grand Unified Theory of Software Development .
